document_data.name: Thump
document_data.mainbody: '''''Thump''''' was a common spell used by [[geisha]]. The spell was extremely rare outside [[Kara-Tur]].
document_data.Effects: This spell was used by geisha to rebuff an attacking creature. The spell summoned an ornamental fan which thumped the aggressive creature. The hostility was then turned onto the creature itself, which left it confused and incoherent.
document_data.Components: The spell required [[somatic component|somatic]], [[verbal component|verbal]] and [[material component]]s.
